text: 1:21-22: a Mt 3:16; Mk 1:9; Lk 3:21; bMk 16:19; Lk 24:51“Acunakyase, Johan naw Baptican1:21-22:Johan naw bapticana mawng sangki; am ani üng Johan naw ani baptican peki. a ja petnak üng tün lü, Jesuh khana a kai be cäpa, mi veia citcawn hü lü vekie üngka, Bawipa Jesuha a thawhnak be saksi na lü jah sang püi khaia khyang mat mi mcawn be khai” a ti.
